source_sentence: 開府儀同三司特進試鴻臚卿肅國
translation: The founding officials of the monastery were the same as the three ministers, and they specially testified to the sovereignty of Hongqian's kingdom.

source_sentence: 公食邑三千戶賜紫贈司空謚大鑒
translation: 3,000 families of the gongshou community were given purple as a gift to the minister Kongqian Dajian.

source_sentence: 正號大廣智大興善寺三藏沙門
translation: He was the Sanzang shaman of Daegwangzhi Daxingshansi.

source_sentence: 不空奉　詔譯
translation: Amoghapāśa interpretation of the imperial edict

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊在迦毘羅城尼俱律那僧伽藍所，與諸比丘，并諸菩薩，無數眾會，
translation: At that time the World-honored One was staying at the monastery of Nikula Monastery in the city of Kapilavastu. He was accompanied by an assembly of monks and also an assembly of bodhisattvas

source_sentence: 前後圍遶，而為說法。
translation: He was surrounded by them in front and behind him, teaching the Dharma.

source_sentence: 爾時，阿難獨居靜處，念所受法。
translation: At the time, Ānanda was living alone in a quiet place, mindful of the teaching he received.

source_sentence: 即於其夜三更已後，見一餓鬼，名曰「焰口」，其形醜陋、身體枯瘦、口中火然、咽如針鋒、頭髮蓬亂、爪牙長利，
translation: Three o’clock that night, he saw a hungry ghost named Burning Mouth. It was ugly in shape, with hoary and thin bodies, its mouth glowing like a needle pointing at the end of its throat,

source_sentence: 甚可怖畏，住阿難前，白阿難言：「却後三日，汝命將盡，即便生於餓鬼之中。」
translation: Being terrified, he stood in front of Ānanda and said to Ānanda, Three days from now, your life will end, and you'll be born among hungry ghosts.

source_sentence: 是時，阿難聞此語已，心生惶怖，問餓鬼言：「若我死後，生餓鬼者，
translation: Having heard these words, Ānanda became frightened and asked the hungry ghosts, “If I were to be born in the realm of hungry ghosts after my death,

source_sentence: 行何方便，得免斯苦？」
translation: What method does he use to avoid this suffering?

source_sentence: 爾時，餓鬼白阿難言：「汝於明日，若能布施百千那由他恒河沙數餓鬼，
translation: It was then that the hungry ghost said to Ānanda, “Tomorrow if you are able to give alms to hundreds of thousands of hungry ghosts as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges River,

source_sentence: 并百千婆羅門仙等，以摩伽陀國所用之斛，各施一斛飲食，并及為我供養三寶，
translation: And a hundred thousand brahmans and other holy ones offered food and drink to each of them, as well as offering the Three Treasures for their sake.

source_sentence: 汝得增壽，令我離於餓鬼之苦、得生天上。」
translation: You'll increase your life span, free me from the suffering of hungry ghosts and be born in heaven.

source_sentence: 阿難見此焰口餓鬼，身形羸瘦、枯燋極醜、口中火然、咽如針鋒、頭髮蓬亂、毛爪長利，
translation: Ānanda saw these fiery-mouthed hungry ghosts, whose bodies were emaciated, with thin and slender bodies, extremely ugly, their mouths on fire, their throats like the tip of a needle, their hair

source_sentence: 又聞如是不順之語，甚大驚怖，身毛皆竪。
translation: Having heard such an un obeying voice, he was greatly frightened and his hair stood on end.

source_sentence: 即從座起，疾至佛所，五體投地，頂禮佛足，身體戰慄，而白佛言：「願救我苦！
translation: He rose from his seat, rushed to the Buddha, prostrated himself on the ground with five bodies, bowed his head at his feet, trembled in fear, and said to him, Please save me from suffering!

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 我住靜處，念所授法，見焰口餓鬼，而語我言：『汝過三日，必當命盡，
translation: When I was staying in a secluded place, mindful of the instruction given to me, I saw a fiery-mouthed hungry ghost. He said to me, “Three days have passed and you will surely die.

source_sentence: 生餓鬼中。』
translation: He'll be born among hungry ghosts.'

source_sentence: 我即問言：『云何令我得免斯苦？』
translation: I then asked, 'How will I be freed from this suffering?'

source_sentence: 餓鬼答言：『汝今若能施於百千那由他恒河沙數餓鬼，及百千婆羅門仙等種種飲食，
translation: The hungry ghost answered, 'Now, if you can give various foods to hundreds of thousands of hungry ghosts as numerous as the grains of sand in a hundred thousand nayutas of Ganges Rivers and hundreds of thousands of Brahmā sa

source_sentence: 汝得增壽。』
translation: You'll attain increased longevity.'

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今云何能辦若干餓鬼、仙人等食？」
translation: How can I now prepare food for various hungry ghosts and sages?

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告阿難言：「汝今勿怖！
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed Ānanda, saying, Don't be afraid now!

source_sentence: 我有方便，令汝能施若干百千恒河沙餓鬼，及諸婆羅門仙等，種種飲食，
translation: I have skillful means to enable you to give various food and drink to hungry ghosts as numerous as the grains of sand in hundreds of thousands of myriads of Ganges Rivers.

source_sentence: 勿生憂惱。」
translation: Don't become sad and distressed.

source_sentence: 佛告阿難：「有陀羅尼，名曰『無量威德自在光明殊勝妙力』。
translation: The Buddha told Ānanda, There's a dhāraṇī named 'The extraordinary and marvelous power of the light of immeasurable authority.'

source_sentence: 若有誦此陀羅尼者，即能充足俱胝那由他百千恒河沙數餓鬼，及婆羅門仙等，
translation: If someone recites this dhāraṇī, they'll be able to satisfy as many hungry ghosts and brahman sages as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River.

source_sentence: 上妙飲食。
translation: It's a wonderful food and drink.

source_sentence: 如是等眾，乃至一一，皆得摩伽陀國所用之斛七七斛食。
translation: Such a multitude of people, even one by one, all obtained seventy-seven huckles of food for consumption in the kingdom of Magadha.

source_sentence: 阿難！
translation: Ānanda!

source_sentence: 我於前世作婆羅門，於觀世音菩薩所，及世間自在威德如來所，受此陀羅尼故，
translation: In a previous life I was a brāhmaṇa and received this dhāraṇī at the feet of Avalokiteśvara Bodhisattva and World-honored Tathāgata Mahāprajāpatīṃdhara.

source_sentence: 能散施與無量餓鬼及諸仙等種種飲食，令諸餓鬼解脫苦身、得生天上。
translation: They can scatter and give various foods to measureless hungry ghosts and sages, so that they'll be freed from the painful body of hungry ghosts and be born in heaven.

source_sentence: 阿難！
translation: Ānanda!

source_sentence: 汝今受持，福德、壽命皆得增長。」
translation: Now that you accept and uphold it, your merits and longevity will all grow.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊即為阿難說陀羅尼曰：「那謨　薩嚩　怛他蘖多(引)　嚩盧枳帝　唵　參婆囉　參婆囉　吽」佛告阿難：「若有善男子、善女人，
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān then explained the dhāraṇī for Ānanda, saying, Nāgârjuna, Sākyamuni, Uttara (citation needed), Kauṇḍinya, Samvararāja, and Samvararāja.

source_sentence: 欲求長壽、福德增榮，速能滿足檀波羅蜜，每於晨朝、及一切時，悉無障礙，
translation: In order to seek long life and increase in virtue, he was able to quickly fulfill the transcendent practice of giving. Every morning and at all times without hindrance.

source_sentence: 取一淨器，盛以淨水，置少飯麨及諸餅食等，以右手加器，誦前陀羅尼滿七遍，
translation: He takes a pure vessel, fills it with pure water, puts in it a small amount of rice, bread, cakes, food, and so forth, joins it with his right hand, and recites the previous dhāraṇī seven times.

source_sentence: 然後稱四如來名號：「曩謨　婆誐嚩帝　鉢囉(二合)枳孃(二合)部(引)多囉怛曩(二合)　怛他孽多也(此云多寶如來)「由稱多寶如來名號加持故，
translation: Then he called the names of the four tathāgatas, Upagupta, Upagupta, Upagupta, Upagupta, Upagupta, Upagupta, Upagupta, Upagupta, Upagupta, Upagupta, Upagupta,

source_sentence: 能破一切諸鬼多生已來慳悋惡業，即得福德圓滿。
translation: He's able to destroy all the bad karma of stinginess and anger that many ghosts have done since they were born, and he'll attain the fulfillment of merit.

source_sentence: 「那謨　婆誐嚩帝　素嚕波(引)耶　怛他誐哆野(此云南無妙色身如來)「由稱妙色身如來名號加持故，
translation: 「那 婆帝 素嚕波(引)耶 他哆野(此云南無妙色身如來 Tathāgata)「由稱妙色身如來如來名號加持,

source_sentence: 能破諸鬼醜陋惡形，即得色相具足。
translation: If they can destroy the ugly and bad forms of ghosts, they'll attain their full physical appearance.

source_sentence: 「曩謨　婆誐嚩帝　尾鉢囉(二合)誐攞孽多怛囉(二合)也　怛他孽多也(此云廣博身如來)「由稱廣博身如來名號加持故，
translation: 「 婆帝 尾鉢囉(二合)攞孽多囉(二合)也 他孽多也(此云廣博身如來如來)「由稱廣博身如來如來名號加持,

source_sentence: 能令諸鬼咽喉寬大，所施之食，恣意充飽。
translation: They can cause the ghosts' throats to be wide and large, and the food they give will be enough to satisfy them as they wish.

source_sentence: 「曩謨　婆誐嚩帝　阿(上)婆(去)孕迦囉也　怛他蘖多也(此云離怖畏如來)「由稱離怖畏如來名號加持故，
translation: 「 婆帝 阿(上)婆(去)孕迦囉也 他多也(此云離恐怖畏如來如來)「由稱離怖畏如來如來名號加持,

source_sentence: 能令諸鬼一切恐怖悉皆除滅，離餓鬼趣。」
translation: It will cause all the ghosts' fears to be completely removed and free them from the destinies of hungry ghosts.

source_sentence: 佛告阿難：「若族姓善男子等，既稱四如來名號加持已，彈指七遍，取於食器，
translation: The Buddha said to Ānanda: Good men of good families, having thus praised the names of the four buddha-tathāgatas, snapped their fingers seven times and took the food vessel.

source_sentence: 於淨地上，展臂瀉之。
translation: On the ground of purity, he spreads his arm and pours it out.

source_sentence: 作此施已，於其四方，有百千那由他恒河沙數餓鬼，前各有摩伽陀國七七斛食。
translation: After he had made this offering, there were hundreds of thousands of hungry ghosts in each of the four directions, as numerous as the number of grains of sand in the Ganges River. In front of each of them was a seventh or eighth hu

source_sentence: 受此食已，悉皆飽滿，是諸鬼等，悉捨鬼身，生於天上。
translation: Having accepted this food, they were all satisfied. All the ghosts abandoned their bodies and were reborn in heaven.

source_sentence: 「阿難！
translation: Ānanda!

source_sentence: 若有比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，常以此密言及四如來名號加持食施鬼，
translation: If there are any monks, bhikṣuṇīs, laymen, or laywomen who always use these esoteric sayings and the names of the four tathāgatas as nourishment-giving ghosts,

source_sentence: 便能具足無量福德，則同供養百千俱胝如來功德等無差別，壽命延長、增益色力、善根具足，
translation: If they can then be endowed with measureless virtue, they'll all equally make offerings to the merits of a hundred thousand koṭis of tathāgatas without distinction, such as extending their life span, increasing their physical strength, and

source_sentence: 一切非人、夜叉、羅剎、諸惡鬼神不敢侵害，又能成就無量福德壽命。
translation: All non-humans, yakṣas, rājas, and bad spirits won't dare to attack them, and they can also attain an immeasurable life span of merit.

source_sentence: 「若欲施諸婆羅門仙等，以淨飲食滿盛一器，即以前密言加持二七遍，
translation: “If you want to give a bowl full of pure food and drink to the brāhmaṇas and śramaṇas, fill it with purified food and drink. That is to say, recite the preceding dhāraṇī two or seven times:

source_sentence: 投於淨流水中。
translation: They'll throw themselves into the pure flow of water.

source_sentence: 如是作已，即為以天仙美妙之食，供養百千俱胝恒河沙數婆羅門仙。
translation: After he had done so, he offered a delicious meal of celestial food and offerings to hundreds of thousands of koṭis of Brahman sages as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.

source_sentence: 彼諸仙人得加持食故，以密言威德，各各成就根本所願、諸善功德，各各同時發誓願言：『願是食人，
translation: Each of them had accomplished their fundamental vows and good qualities, each simultaneously making a vow, saying, 'May this be the person who eats.

source_sentence: 令壽延長、色力安樂；
translation: I elucidate the means of attaining enlightenment by extending life spans and peace and happiness in physical appearance.

source_sentence: 又令其人，心所見聞，正解清淨，具足成就梵天威德、行梵天行。
translation: It also causes their minds to see and hear, correctly understand and purify what they see and hear, fully perfecting the authoritative qualities of Brahmā Heaven and practicing the practices of Brahmā.

source_sentence: 又同供養百千恒河沙如來功德，一切冤讎不能侵害。』
translation: They also make offerings to the Tathāgata's merits as numerous as the sands of a hundred thousand Ganges Rivers, and all enemies won't attack them.'

source_sentence: 「若比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，若欲供養佛、法、僧寶，應以香、華及淨飲食，
translation: “If monks, nuns, laymen, and laymen want to make offerings to the treasures of buddhas, Dharma, and Sangha, they should offer incense, flowers, and pure food and drink.

source_sentence: 以前密言加持二十一遍，奉獻三寶。
translation: Formerly he recited the sutra twenty-one times in secret and offered it to the Three Treasures.

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人，則成以天餚饍上味，奉獻供養滿十方界佛、法、僧寶，
translation: These sons and daughters of a virtuous family will be able to partake of heavenly food with delicious flavors and offer it as an offering to the Buddha, Dharma, and Sangha treasures that fill the ten directions.

source_sentence: 亦為讚歎、勸請、隨喜功德，恒為諸佛憶念稱讚，諸天善神恒來擁護，
translation: For the sake of praising, encouraging, and rejoicing in their virtues they always remember and extol the Buddhas. Gods and good deities will always come to protect them.

source_sentence: 即為滿足檀波羅蜜。
translation: That's to fulfill the perfection of giving.

source_sentence: 「阿難！
translation: Ānanda!

source_sentence: 汝隨我語，如法修行，廣宣流布，令諸眾生普得見聞，獲無量福。
translation: Following my words, you should cultivate practice in accordance with the teaching and disseminate it widely so that all sentient beings will attain seeing and hearing and gain immeasurable merit.

source_sentence: 是名『救焰口餓鬼及苦眾生陀羅尼經』，以是名字，汝當奉持。」
translation: This is called the Dhāraṇī Sutra for Saving Burning-mouthed Hungry ghosts and suffering sentient beings, which you should follow by that name.

source_sentence: 一切大眾及阿難等，聞佛說已，一心信受，歡喜奉行。
translation: Having heard the Buddha’s discourse, all the members of the sangha and Ānanda listened to it. They wholeheartedly believed in it and remembered it with joy.

source_sentence: 救拔焰口餓鬼陀羅尼經
translation: Dhāraṇī for Saving the Burning-Mouth Hungry Ghosts
